text: Lloyd Alma "Al" Mansell (born January 23, 1944) is an American former politician in the state of Utah. He served in the Utah State Senate as a Republican from the 10th district from 1995 to 2001. He also served stints as President of the Utah Senate, as well as Assistant Majority Leader.https://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/2883/l-alma- mansell#.W5q1-5NKg6g He was born in Midvale, Utah and attended the University of Utah and worked as a real estate broker.https://digitallibrary.utah.gov/awweb/awarchive?type=download&item;=59356https://www.deseretnews.com/article/767892/Mansell --Associates-was-first-Utah-real-estate-firm-to-earn-ethics-award.html ==References== Category:Living people Category:1944 births Category:Utah Republicans
title: L. Alma Mansell
